text: Bernard Woodward may refer to: *Bernard Barham Woodward (1853–1930), British malacologist, son of Samuel Pickworth Woodward *Bernard Bolingbroke Woodward (1816–1869), British minister and librarian, brother of Samuel Pickworth Woodward *Bernard Henry Woodward (1846–1916), British-born Australian museum director, son of Samuel Pickworth Woodward ==See also== *Woodward (surname)
title: Bernard Woodward
